com.bitpay.sdk.model.rate

Class Rates

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bitpay.sdk.model.rate.Rates

  • public class Rates
extends Object
    Rates are exchange rates, representing the number of fiat currency units equivalent to one BTC.
    See Also:
    REST API Rates
